resources.string: If Your Country Code Is "091" Then Add Your Phone Number As "+91" Followed By Your Mobile Number
Enter Your Phone Number To Sign In

Welcome to Mega Prospect.


https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=inc.emeraldsoff.megaprospectsnext


 Mega-prospect presents an app to organizing all the data of your clients on your fingertips: smarter life in one swipe. No hassle, difficulties and worries.

Mega-prospect promises you to give a better manageable and organized way of putting important data of clients. 

 Features 
>Smartest technology for organizing data. 
>Helps to create an effective customer relationship management. 
>App works in both online and offline mode. 
>Very little consumption on internet data. 
>Direct calling and messaging the client from the app. 
>Note adding facility is available.
